name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
User contribution
An interview on Bilibili about journalistic ideals. The barrage has been turned off, and many comments have been censored. Many comments and content are indirect, and the comments below are full of complaints from journalists.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: [Before graduating from Communication University of China, I went to a newsstand and encountered a hundred kinds of news ideals]

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
In the early morning of April 6, a murder occurred in Coventry, England, resulting in the death of one Chinese student and the injury of another.
According to the news, Penqui Sun from Coventry was charged with murder and will appear in Coventry District Court on Saturday (April 8).
It is reported that some local students discussed the incident on Xiaohongshu and were asked to delete the post by the local Chinese Students' Association.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Recently, a video titled "Driving to chase the dean, killing two people, the driver died on the spot" was circulated on the Internet in Changshu City, Jiangsu Province, and attracted attention
On April 8, the Changshu Municipal Health Commission responded: "The traffic accident exposed online is true, but the cause is unclear and we have to wait for the police to report.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution 
The chaos of domestic postgraduate entrance examination adjustment, Suzhou University of Science and Technology released the supplementary enrollment information at 4:30 in the morning, and required students to reply and confirm within half an hour, otherwise it would be regarded as giving up. It is suspected that there is a secret operation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On the morning of April 6, a junior high school student in Changshu City, Suzhou, Jiangsu Province, injured others with a knife. At 10 a.m. that day, an insider revealed that the incident occurred at the Chongwen campus of Changshu Experimental Middle School. "The incident happened this morning. The girl seemed to have a dagger. The injured boy was suspected to have died. The specific reason for the conflict is still unclear.
The reporter tried to contact the Chongwen campus of Changshu Experimental Middle School. The staff said: "The specific situation is not very clear. The public security personnel are currently understanding the specific situation and are still investigating." The reporter then tried to contact the Hongqiao Police Station of the Changshu Public Security Bureau, to which the school belongs, and the operator said that he was not clear about the incident.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Breaking news! Around 10pm on April 8, a man drove his car and hit passers-by randomly near Yewang Village, Xincheng District, Pingdingshan City, Henan Province.
According to netizens, six people have died at the scene.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to online information, it is suspected that the emotional excitement was caused by family conflicts.
